title: I want to learn everything about batteries and energy storage. Where should I look? - Quora

response.answer_text: First, you’ll need to learn about electric generation, if you haven’t already. Then, you’ll be ready to learn about storage. Both topics are covered in the classes given by this organization: Solar Training, Solar PV Training, Solar Installer Training, Solar Energy International They offer courses online, at their location in Colorado, or at numerous locations around the world (the schedule, classes and locations are changing all the time). Refer to the classes which are “battery based” in the solar electric section of their course schedule. These are mostly level 2 course, requiring completion of certain level 1 courses. Two or three courses should set you on your way nicely.
Search for university delft in edX They have exactly the training you're looking for.
